symbol
  1. An honorific head mark which heralds the beginning of text or commencement of a new folio. In Tibetan it is called ཡིག་མགོ་མདུན་མ (yig mgo mdun ma).

name
  1. A Tibetan mark (Unicode 0F05: ༅) that closes the head marks with which it ligates. The name for this sign in the Tibetan script is ཡིག་མགོ་སྒབ་མ (yig mgo sgab ma).
